title: Covid Variant From India Triggers WHO Concern Over Fast Spread
content:
1. Covid Variant From India Triggers WHO Concern Over Fast Spread  Bloomberg
  2. COVID-19 variant first seen in India designated as global concern, WHO says  Global News
  3. WHO names B1617 fourth COVID-19 variant of concern  CIDRAP
  4. Covid Variant From India Triggers WHO Concern  Bloomberg Markets and Finance
  5. Top English medic hopeful new variant of concern will not escape vaccines  Reuters

localize.title: インドで発生したCovidの変異体がWHOに急速な拡大を懸念させる
来自印度的Covid变体引发世卫组织对快速传播的担忧
